title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 152 - Time And Place For Filing New York State Income Tax Returns And Payment Of Income Tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 152 - Time And Place For Filing New York State Income Tax Returns And Payment Of Income Tax

State Regulations

Time for Filing New York State Income Tax Returns (§ 152.1 to 152.11)

Place for Filing New York State Income Tax Returns (§ 152.12 to 152.13)

Payment of Income Tax (§ 152.14 to 152.19)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 152

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 652[a], 657[a], 697

This Part does not reflect amendments to the Tax Law made
by the Tax Reform and Reduction Act of 1987 (Chapter 28 of the Laws of 1987)
and certain other amendments. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
